summary: The diff primarily adds a full new frontend app shell and multiple pages/components themed around an online casino reviews site branded as "Yono Store". Visible UI branding includes "Yono Store" in the home hero, header/footer logo alt text, and the admin sidebar. However, there is no clear evidence of updating the default HTML document metadata (e.g., <title>) to "Yono Store". The diff also introduces many unrequested new UI features/pages beyond simple rebranding.

missing_requirements.requirement: Set default HTML document metadata to use "Yono Store" (at minimum: document title) so browser tabs and shared previews use the updated site name where applicable.
missing_requirements.reason: No index.html/head/metadata configuration change is shown in the diff summary. The provided files include React entrypoints and pages but do not show any document title or meta tag setup.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a large multi-page online casino content site (Home, Casinos, Bonuses, News, Complaints, detail pages) with extensive mock data and UI flows.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to renaming/rebranding to "Yono Store"; adding new product features/pages is explicitly a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an admin area (dashboard + listings/news/promo codes/complaints management pages) with UI actions and mock datasets.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; this is new functionality beyond rebranding.

hallucinated_features.description: Added authentication wiring and actor/query infrastructure (Internet Identity provider usage, actor creation hook, React Query hooks).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states not to change authentication approach or add auth features; also constraints caution against editing certain auth/actor files, while the diff adds new implementations not tied to rebranding.

hallucinated_features.description: Added theming and toaster/notification integration (next-themes ThemeProvider and sonner Toaster/toasts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested as part of branding rename; constitutes additional UX functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed backend canister source to an empty Motoko actor (actor {}).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request backend logic changes; adding a new backend/main.mo (especially empty) is unrelated to rebranding requirements.
